abstract: Bank of America announced on Friday that it was reviewing the working conditions of its junior employees after a 21-year-old intern died recently in London.
snippet: Bank of America announced on Friday that it was reviewing the working conditions of its junior employees after a 21-year-old intern died recently in London.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Bank of America announced on Friday that it was reviewing the working conditions of its junior employees after a 21-year-old intern died recently in London.

headline.main: Bank of America to Review Intern Working Conditions
